dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures.   Outline color.   Shows Russian America [Alaska], British Territory, Greenland, the United States, Mexico, "Guatimala," and the "West India Islands"; state of Texas without panhandle; areas of Indian habitation.   Includes illustrations: Esquimaux dog-sledge--Mounta Hekla--Beavers--Falls of Niagara--Convoy of diamonds--Ancient monument, Mexico--North American Indians--Wapiti Deer--Cossacks.|30 x 22 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:38,016,000|General Map Collection
